Item ID1201

The Rune kiteshield is the best smithable kiteshield, requiring 40 Defence to wield. A player with 97 Smithing can make the shield by using three runite bars and a hammer on an anvil, granting 225 Smithing experience.

The rune kiteshield is often used as a tank shield by low-risk and void rangers; despite the negative ranged attack bonus, it is much cheaper, and provides a substantial melee defence bonus, which the Odium ward lacks.

Players with at least level 43 Crafting are also able to paint the rune kiteshield at a player-owned house to create an untradeable heraldic shield, provided that they have visited Sir Renitee to obtain a crest in advance. A painted rune kiteshield will provide protection in the God Wars Dungeon as of an April 2019 update. It will turn bandits hostile, if painted in the colours of Saradomin or Zamorak.

Any monster that has access to the rare drop table can also drop the rune kiteshield.

[[File:Rune kiteshield detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Rune kiteshield''' is the best smithable [[kiteshield]], requiring 40 [[Defence]] to wield. A player with 97 [[Smithing]] can make the shield by using three [[runite bar]]s and a [[hammer]] on an [[anvil]], granting 225 Smithing [[experience]].

The rune kiteshield is often used as a tank shield by low-risk and [[Void Knight equipment|void]] rangers; despite the negative [[ranged]] attack bonus, it is much cheaper, and provides a substantial [[melee]] defence bonus, which the [[Odium ward]] lacks.

Players with at least level 43 [[Crafting]] are also able to paint the rune kiteshield at a [[player-owned house]] to create an untradeable [[Heraldic kiteshield (Construction)|heraldic shield]], provided that they have visited [[Sir Renitee]] to obtain a crest in advance. A painted rune kiteshield will provide protection in the [[God Wars Dungeon]] as of an April 2019 update. It will turn [[Bandit (Bandit Camp)|bandits]] hostile, if painted in the colours of [[Saradomin]] or [[Zamorak]].

Any monster that has access to the [[rare drop table]] can also drop the rune kiteshield.
